channel.title: My internet wont connect to certain servers?
channel.description:
Hey, sorry if this is the wrong section. My problem started yesterday, all of a sudden, for some reason I cant connect to servers such as rscangel and stork.pk (the only two I have played) and I am unsure why. My friend told me that he can connect perfectly so I am really confused as to why I cant.
Does anyone have any ideas?
I also posted this in the rscangel thread under the advertise your server section, but I thought maybe I could get more help here too.

item.title: My internet wont connect to certain servers?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“JeremyM, post:9, topic:283212”]The problem just started again… I tried installing java again and it’s still no help. It’ll probably work if I give it some time, but last time I had to wait a couple days. Im going to try unplugging my internet and plugging it in again.[/quote] Did you do your environmental variables?

Read full topic

item.title: My internet wont connect to certain servers?
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

[quote=“adu, post:5, topic:283212”][quote author=pesterd link=topic=374245.msg2822333#msg2822333 date=1244690641]
my personal favorite

http://cmyip.com/
[/quote]

TY lol its perfect Nice and large with barely anything else on the page to annoy you

Thats a nice and simple webpage, I like it! =]

@jeremy, some of the infections are undetectable (I think). PM an admin on one of those servers with your IP and see if they can help.[/quote]

item.description:
@JeremyM wrote:

Alright, thanks guys (and I’m glad its the right section to post :P)

Is there anything I need to delete to stop this attack on rsca?

Also, how do I find my ip

Read full topic
item.source: My internet wont connect to certain servers?

item.title: My internet wont connect to certain servers?
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Maybe your computer is infected by a botnet and then must have been used as a zombie to attack rsca and st0rk. Then rsca or st0rk must have blocked your ip from connecting to the address of the server. Pm the admins of those servers with your ip and see if they can help.

Read full topic
